meanings.definition: Muzziest: superlative form of muzzy, meaning very unclear or confused
meanings.sent1: The fog made everything look muzziest, like trying to see through a thick curtain.
meanings.sent2: Her mind felt muzziest when she tried to remember what happened during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The detective's muzziest explanation of the case left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were muzziest, like a jumbled puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The old photograph was so faded that the faces appeared muzziest, almost ghostly.
